product_name: Thule Rapid Crossroad Railing Foot Pack - Set of 4
long_description: Turn your factory-installed raised rails into a versatile rack system with these strong and well-fitting car rack mounts. Designed exclusively for use with the Rapid Aero aluminum load bars. A seamless look complementing the factory rails is achieved with integrated foot and Rapid Aero aluminum load bar. Feet tighten to bar and factory rails simultaneously with integrated one-piece bolt and handle assembly. Wide footpad surface ensures excellent load distribution. Mount's smooth surfaces prevent shifting and protect your car's paint. No tools required for assembly; easy-to-follow instructions included. Quick rack removal with convenient push button. Can be locked in place using Thule One Key System lock cylinders, sold separately. Designed for use with custom-fitting Thule Fit Kits, sold separately. Set of 4.
short_description: Turn your factory-installed raised rails into a versatile rack system with these strong and well-fitting car rack mounts.
